com.avaya.gsmb.seleniumframework.test

Class TestCase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.avaya.gsmb.seleniumframework.test.TestCase

  • public abstract class TestCase
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class is acting as a Baseclass for an Application Test Case and is to be inherited by the specific Application Test Case Class.
    Author:
    admin
